backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report describing addition of the app logo to the landing empty-state screen and listing related files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text listing short summaries of various frontend files and their purposes.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining color tokens, dark mode overrides, and base element styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing search and selection flow and rendering EmptyState, LocationSearch, or WeatherPanel.
frontend/src/components/AdviceBanner.tsx: Weather advice alert component selecting icons and styles based on advice type and conditions.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Page layout wrapper adding header, footer, and gradient background around main content.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Landing screen showing logo, hero image, description, and button to begin location search.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with attribution, credits, and external links for data sources.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header displaying app logo, name, and tagline using branding constants.
frontend/src/components/LocationSearch.t: Search UI for finding places with input, results list, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/WeatherPanel.tsx: Main weather display showing conditions, metrics, advice banner, and controls to retry or change location.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor via React Query and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentWeather.ts: Fetches current weather data for given coordinates with React Query and 10‑minute caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Dfinity Internet Identity, handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlaceSearch.ts: Defines a disabled-by-default React Query hook for place search using the geocoding service.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing and documenting that query hooks live elsewhere.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme color variables and base styling.
frontend/src/lib/branding.ts: Exports the app name and tagline constants.
frontend/src/lib/weatherAdvice.ts: Generates contextual weather advice based on temperature, conditions, and wind speed.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/services/geocoding.ts: Searches location data from Nominatim and normalizes it into Place objects.
frontend/src/services/weatherApi.ts: Fetches current weather from Open‑Meteo and maps response fields into WeatherData format.
frontend/src/types/weather.ts: Defines interfaces for Place, WeatherData, and WeatherAdvice.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling themes, custom colors, fonts, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state, listing implemented features such as Motoko backend, React/Tailwind frontend, shadcn/ui, Internet Identity auth, weather search/display, and a logo addition requirement. Also includes project metadata and feature request scaffolding.
